mapper.select: select theme_idx, title, theme_rank, genre, synopsis, people_limit, playtime, payment, img_url, name, theme.cafe_id from theme join cafe on theme.cafe_id = cafe.cafe_id where theme.cafe_id = 1

select theme_idx, title, theme_rank, genre, synopsis, people_limit, playtime, payment, img_url, name, theme.cafe_id from theme join cafe on theme.cafe_id = cafe.cafe_id where theme.cafe_id = #{cafeId}

select title, people_limit, playtime, payment, img_url, name, theme.theme_idx, theme.cafe_id, theme.people_limit from theme join cafe on theme.cafe_id = cafe.cafe_id where theme.theme_idx = #{themeId} and theme.cafe_id = #{cafeId}
select board_idx, comm_title, cafe_id, comm_theme_idx from communication order by board_idx desc
select board_idx, comm_title, cafe_id, comm_theme_idx from communication where cafe_id = #{cafeIdx} and comm_theme_idx = #{themeIdx} order by board_idx desc limit 3
SELECT t.theme_idx, t.title FROM theme t JOIN cafe c ON t.cafe_id = c.cafe_id WHERE c.name = #{cafeName}
